title: kalista bug?
body: Sometimes when i play kalista my passive doesn't work, like I can't dash, i dont have any lag, happens randomly.

replies.body: Kalista's control mechanics were recently changed so that you can no longer use LMB or any controls dependent on that to dash anymore. Not sure why they did it but it did cause me a lot of frustration, because I got used to it. You sure it's not that?
